Overall, the Whistleblowing Modul is an important tool for organizations to promote a culture of transparency and ethical behavior, while also providing a means for employees to report any concerns they may have in a secure and confidential manner.

9. The Scanmanager identifies the conversation based on the QR code

results.question: Was ist FTE-Basis in rexx HR?

In rexx HR, FTE stands for Full-Time Equivalent. It refers to the number of full-time employees that can be hired with a given number of working hours or budget. In other words, it's a way to measure the workforce capacity of an organization based on the number of hours worked by its employees, rather than the actual number of employees.

For example, if an organization has a budget for 1000 working hours per month and wants to hire additional staff to cover a busy season, it can use FTE to determine how many full-time employees it needs to hire to meet that demand. The FTE calculation takes into account the average number of hours worked by each employee, which is typically 40 hours per week for a full-time employee.

In rexx HR, FTE can be used in various contexts, such as:

1. Workforce planning: To determine the optimal number of employees needed to meet business demand while keeping costs under control.
2. Budgeting: To allocate a fixed budget for staffing purposes and ensure that the organization is making the most efficient use of its resources.
3. Performance management: To measure the productivity of employees and identify areas where improvements can be made to increase efficiency.
4. Compensation and benefits: To determine the appropriate compensation and benefits package for each employee based on their FTE status.

Each profile represents a set of rights and permissions that are assigned to a user based on their role within the organization. When a user has multiple roles, their profiles are combined to reflect their overall entitlements.

In Rexx HR, the combination of profiles is done in a hierarchical manner, with the highest-level profile taking precedence over lower-level profiles. This means that if a user has multiple roles with different profile assignments, the rights and permissions from the highest-level profile will override those from lower-level profiles.

For example, if a user has two roles, one with profile A and one with profile B, their combined profile will reflect the rights and permissions from both profiles. If the user then receives a third role with profile C, their combined profile will be updated to include the rights and permissions from all three profiles.

The combination of profiles is done in real-time, so users can see the impact of each new role they are assigned on their overall entitlements. This allows for easy management of user permissions and ensures that users have the appropriate level of access to perform their job duties.

results.question: Wie funktionieren Vorlagen in rexx HR?

In rexx HR, the new "Dokument" workflow type introduces a flexible and customizable way to create and manage documents. One of the key features of this module is the ability to use templates to streamline the document creation process. Templates are pre-defined forms that can be used as a starting point for creating new documents.

To use templates in rexx HR, you first need to create a template form. This form will serve as the basis for your new documents, and you can add or remove fields as needed. Once you have created your template, you can use it to generate new documents by simply filling in the appropriate fields.

The template form is made up of several sections, each of which contains a specific type of field. For example, you might have a section for adding the employee's name, another for including the job title, and so on. Each section can be customized to include the fields that are relevant to your organization.

When you create a new document using a template, rexx HR will automatically fill in the appropriate fields based on the information you have provided. This can save a significant amount of time and effort compared to creating a document from scratch.

results.question: Was sind Typen-Administration?

results.generated_answer:
Das rexx Empfehlungsmanagement ist ein Instrument zur Attraktion und Retention von Top-Talent in einem Unternehmen. Es basiert auf der Idee, dass hervorragende Mitarbeiter oft durch Empfehlungen anderer Mitarbeiter in das Unternehmen gelangen. Das rexx Empfehlungsmanagement bietet eine integrierte Administration für das klassische und das Talentbringer-Empfehlungsmanagement.

Die rexx Software unterstützt zwei Arten von Empfehlungsmanagement:

1. Klassisches Empfehlungsmanagement: Dies ist die Standardsorte des Empfehlungsmanagements, die mit der rexx Suite (rexx ER und rexx HR) genutzt wird.
2. Talentbringer-Empfehlungsmanagement: Diese Variante des Empfehlungsmanagements ist speziell für das rexx ER Stand-Alone (ohne rexx HR) entwickelt worden.

Beide Varianten des Empfehlungsmanagments können im rexx Employee Self Service Portal publiziert werden, um Daten leicht übergeben zu können. Gleichzeitig tragen die Empfehlungen zu einem nachhaltig positiven Employer Branding für das Unternehmen bei.

results.question: Wie funktioniert das Personal/User Setup?
results.expected_answer: Das Personal/User Setup ermöglicht die Konfiguration von Benutzerkonten und Personalstammdaten im System.

Das Personal/User Setup ist ein wichtiger Bestandteil von rexx HR Software, um die Benutzerdaten vor dem Erstdatenimport zu konfigurieren. Hierbei können Sie ein neues Personal/User Setup anlegen und bestimmte Felder wie z.B. Workflows, Mail-Schema, Telefon und mehr einfügen. Diese Felder werden dann automatisch in der Importdatei berücksichtigt.

Um das Personal/User Setup zu erstellen, öffnen Sie eine beliebige Vorlage (z.B. Führungskräfte Vollzeit). Durch Klicken in das Feld Zusatzfelder können Sie weitere Felder hinzufügen, die dann im Personal/User Setup berücksichtigt werden. Diese neuen Felder müssen zunächst in der Felderkonfiguration (Personal) angenommen werden, bevor sie Teil des Personal/User Setups sind.

Durch das Personal/User Setup können Sie den Benutzern eine bestimmte Rolle zuweisen und ihnen entsprechend Rechte vergeben. Dies ermöglicht es Ihnen, die Anwenderzugriffe auf verschiedene Arbeitsbereiche und Aktivitäten innerhalb Ihres rexx HR zu steuern.
